balanceBreakdown.title: Balance Breakdown
balanceBreakdown.disclaimer: Note: Unverified Pi from team members requires them to complete KYC.

teamInsights.title: Team Insights

isNotOperator.title: Become a Node Operator
isNotOperator.description: Help secure the Pi Network and earn rewards by running a node. Click below to learn more and get started.
isNotOperator.button: Learn More on Pi Network Official Site
